description.value:
Favored Weapon @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Glaive]

The Order of the Pyre is dedicated to eliminating those faiths and beliefs they consider to be a threat to the Inner Sea region. They are particularly keen on stamping out dangerous cults.

Lesser Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Righteous Resistance]

Greater Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Spiritual Disruption]
